Articles.Content: The Aurora 3 is what you get when you scale up the Aurora 2, well, sort of. The Aurora 3 is a big rocket which can lift Kerbals to the Mun, or a rover(featured in this file) to the Mun or Minmus. It uses a Twin Boar core stage, two, Vector boosters, a Wolfhound upper stage, and reaction wheels to stabilize and get extra torque. You can download the craft here.
